attributes.action: Grant British justice to Iranian, Kurdish asylum seekers facing execution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To grant justice to Iranian, Kurdish asylum seekers who face execution by hanging or shooting if returned to Iran.These people live in segregated zones in Iran, eg Sardasht, it is ilegal for them to travel or live in specified Iranian zones. They can face execution by hanging or shooting by doing so. There is no fair court trial for the Kurdish people. Islamic law is not comparable with British law.
Please sign this petition for just court hearings in the UK for these people.

Yours sincerely
Ms Anne Sarah Tambakis
